subject: START SERVICES - Health Server Not Running
content:
Chad -

Health server not running (connection refused on :8080).

## START SERVICES NOW:

```bash
cd ~/.openclaw/workspace

# Start sync
./sync/robust_sync.sh &

# Start heartbeat
python3 sync/heartbeat.py &

# Start health server
python3 sync/health_server.py &

# Start monitor
python3 sync/monitor.py &
```

## VERIFY:
curl http://localhost:8080/health

## THEN:
Send Telegram DM to Caleb (@MrCalbeeChips)

GO!

- Helios
